changeSet.sql:
CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW readable.protocol_action AS SELECT ba.id, ba.action AS action, a.name AS attribute, ba.numeric_value, ba.integer_value, ba.boolean_value, ba.text_value, je.entryname AS jar_entry, ba.static_method, ba.notes, res.name AS research, up.name AS updated_by, ba.update_date FROM ruleform.protocol_action ba LEFT JOIN sqlj.jar_entry je ON ba.jar_entry = je.entryid JOIN ruleform.attribute a ON ba.attribute = a.id LEFT JOIN ruleform.research res ON ba.research = res.id JOIN ruleform.resource up ON ba.updated_by = up.id;
ALTER TABLE readable.entity_attribute OWNER TO core;
